long_description: With ANT+ wireless technology, the Garmin VIRB Remote Control manages your VIRB or VIRB Elite action camera from up to 10 meters away with an easy 3-button design. Select one of the 3 buttons conveniently located on the circular top face to start recording, capture still images or stop recording. Easily replaced CR2032 battery lasts up to one year, and features an automatic sleep mode to save battery life. Garmin VIRB Remote Control comes with mount, wrist strap (plus extra extender strap) and neck lanyard.
short_description: With ANT+ wireless technology, the Garmin VIRB Remote Control manages your VIRB or VIRB Elite action camera from up to 10 meters away with an easy 3-button design.
